post.body: Santa baby, slip Las Vegas under the tree...for me. Been an awful good girl. Thank you, honey. http://twitpic.com/tais
Re-tweeting cuz I'm excited and thankful for Vegas and cuz I like the way you look in that hat. ;-)
G'nite! I'll be hitting the hay soon, too.
Danke. Feels good to be able to tell it like it is.
You're an ass-buster, Dave. Not 2b confused with being an ass, buster. Oh, & ______could mean anything. Like, bake u cookies.
Dedication & discipline. It's inspiring. And sexy as hell. So be prepared for more tweets about how much I wanna_______you.
But thru the magic of Twitter, I've developed an even deeper respect 4 u & the way u busted yur ass day & nite in the studio.
I make a lot of thinly veiled comments about how much I wanna _______ you and quite frankly, I mean every word of it.
SIGH...dare to dream.
You know, I would bet that's exactly the case (the mall thing). Why not? He's a regular guy. Sorta. Kinda. Well..
Actually I do plan on getting into some decadence while there...we'll see how it all goes.
That's okay, though. I like it when it's quiet. No jibber jabber, twitter twatter, as I imagine Mr. T would put it. LOL.
Hey you. I'm finally able to come on here for more than 2 minutes and it's a dead zone...like those verizon wireless commercials
Oh really, well it can stay there. I will be fully clothed both nights. ;-)
Same here. I'm sure there will be some kind of Twitter meet-up coordinated. Now THAT would be interesting. Hmm...
Hey! I'm just tweetin' I don't have time to hang...unfortunately. I'm in and out, though.
My profile pic misses your profile pic. May yur little finger doggie come out & play? I've got treats. In the form of tweets.
Cherishing life's sweetest gifts. Luv, laughter, friendship & family. No gift box required. & thanking life for gifting us U.
Hope♥you♥woke♥to♥warm♥hugs♥sweet♥kisses♥and♥all♥your♥ Christmas♥wishes. Plus♥all♥the♥love♥your♥desires. Happy Christmas, Dave
Is it wrong to be stoned on Christmas Eve? Nicely stoned, mind you. My...er..friend wants to know. Anyone is free to answer.
@All My Twits & Your Families The ULTIMATE version of my ultimate Christmas song...http://tinyurl.com/8o2odp
You, too, Amber! That endless blessings of happiness come your way. That is my Christmas wish for you. ;-)
Thank you, darlin'! Back at 'cha!
Basking in those good vibes of yurs. Thank u! I wish u all the ♥ in the world...2nite, 2morrow & EVERYDAY! Happy Christmas, luv!
May♥you♥wake♥to♥warm♥hugs♥sweet♥kisses♥and♥all♥your♥ Christmas♥wishes. Plus♥all♥the♥love♥your♥desires. Happy Christmas, Dave.
@All My Twitter Friends: HAPPY HAPPY CHRISTMAS, Everyone! Turn it up and ENJOY! http://tinyurl.com/7dpwh2
My night ended with you singing me to sleep, providing the soundtrack for my dreams. I hope yours ended with as much bliss.
Bedtime. Gonna take you with me, have you sing me to sweet sleep & let you roam around my little head while I dream.
I've got your sweet voice in my ears, (Rockin' China Club/04) beautifully filling the void of your Twitter absence for me.
SO excited about DMBLive and getting all three shows right about......NOW. Gracias, Santa. Luv to Luv, ya, baby.
Hey there. I'm fantastic. Looking forward to a little four-day holiday coming up. Oh, and Christmas, too! How've YOU been?
Helluva way to end the year, my dear. VERY happy for ya. Love the pics, too.
Good night, you. I am already safely tucked and fading...
A little place called The Kingfish Cafe. Love their chicken & waffles. ;-)
And my favorite restaurant is in/on Capital Hill.
Wishing for a continuation of last nights' dream...tonight. THAT'S what I'm doing, Twitter. If you MUST know. Bonne nuit...
Gotta play catch-up so: It's about to be raining @DaveJMatthews tweets in 5...4...3...2...1...
Home. And Twitter is a ghost town when Dave doesn't tweet. My goodness. Enjoy real life and some catch-up sleep, tweeples. ;-)
Another legend lost. R.I.P. Ms. Kitt. Thank you for this: http://tinyurl.com/2f5hqk
MERRY CHRISTMAS, EVERYONE! WHAT A BEAUTIFUL RAINY DAY IN THE CITY OF ANGELS. I wish u inner peace, prosperity, happiness & hope-always hope
